```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

USAboundaries::us_states(resolution = "low")
library(mapview)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(units)
library(USAboundaries)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(gghighlight)
library(ggrepel)
library(knitr)
library(rmapshaper)

conus = USAboundaries::us_states() %>%
filter(!stusps %in% c("AK", "HI", "PR")) %>%
st_transform(crs = 5070) %>% 
st_combine()

stConus <- st_simplify(conus, dTolerance = 55000)
msConus <- ms_simplify(conus, keep = 0.01)
geom_sf(data = stConus)

 
ggplot() +
geom_sf(data = conus)+
labs(title = paste("Number of points: ", mapview::npts(conus)),
caption = "Number of Points with the Raw data")

ggplot() +
geom_sf(data = msConus) +
labs(title = paste("Number of points: ", mapview::npts(msConus)),
caption = "Number of Points while Using ms_simplify")

ggplot() +
geom_sf(data = stConus) +
labs(title = paste("Number of points: ", mapview::npts(stConus)),
caption = "Number of Points while using st_simplify()")
